name: afastidioushat
text: A comment left by afastidioushat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, madnes, Ariamaki, rascaldom, luasn, Magb, empy)

name: farqussus
text: If the second fart is not fully articulated, the baby runs a very real risk of developing quick onset diabetes.

name: tripperday
text: Onstad's baby runs a very real risk of her head getting fucked with when she's older.

name: invidious
text:
Onstad's a total bastard.

It makes the comic great, though, so I'll give him a pass.

name: audry
text: onstead is a dick, but mainly because he let a five year old babysit his infant

name: tekende
text: Aw, I bet the Onstads just let him "babysit" while they were in the next room for a little while.

name: bucklemyshoe
text:
I'd be willing to bet he could hear the second fart from in there.

What a dick.

name: cygnusx-1
text:
Oh man, that got me thinking. I imagined Chris in the other room, not just hearing the farts, but actually standing there with his hands on his mouth making them. All giggling making the super wet sounding ones while his wife is mad because she just got to sleep for the first time since having the baby.

Just really made this comic that much funnier for me.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He's being a dick to a total 5-year old!

name: tragicone
text: Llewelynn Ash told Philippe not of this.

name: jamers
text: Philippe's worst fears come true in this strip.

name: delzhand
text: A comment left by delzhand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crowpaw, odaya, SPECTRE)

text: as seen on onstadickery.com

name: setzkin
text: I'm not sure why I tried to go there; really what good could possibly come of a site with such a domain?

name: cousinted
text: I'm pretty sure Onstad is the one who built Lie-Bot

name: tommycrashwreck
text:
[IMGS OFF]

Dammit guys we all know Philippe can't turn his head that far!

name: numberkillinger
text: this needs chubbies. it is pretty much exactly perfect.

name: i_love_kate
text: Apart from the fact that he is talking out of his groin. When we all know very well that Lie Bot talks exclusively out of his arse.

name: sje46
text: Why teh heck am I getting deja vu from this thread?

name: anzio
text: Actually, all the robots talk out of a small hole in the side of their heads.

name: vweep
text: Chubbied for "pretty much exactly perfect".

name: heccibiggs
text: THE PERFECT THING TO PHOTOSHOP, EVER!

name: mystkmanat
text: SPLUT

name: shoinan
text: You. Are. Genius.

name: rasalghul
text:
holy shit! I had to create a sockpuppet account to chubby this! [i]this is not something I really did[i].
But seriously, I've not yet wanted to chubby so many more comments on a page than I am allotted.

name: rasalghul
text: I did not close my tags. This is to prove I strongly suspect I know how to do it, I just forgot to do it.

name: saint
text: I feel really bad for Phillipe. I want to punch Onstad in the knee.

name: wittyname
text: Onstad made his mascara run and everything!

name: pigs
text: It looks like his eyes are bleeding...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: in my driver's license picture it looks like my eyes are bleeding. the tear ducts are extremely visible red/pink.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: My goodness!

name: wilbur
text: "My goodness!" is like Phillipe's "Wow! signal."

name: fermatprime
text: Are you calling Onstad's kid an alien? 'Cause it sounds to me like you're calling Onstad's kid an alien.

name: tellumo
text: I think he's the alien observer in this analogy. Like the alien observers have the "Wow!" signal, Philippe has the "My goodness!" fart.

name: dracer2
text: Yes, Philippe is the alien observer, making the baby the observed alien, hence the reason it sounds to Fermetprime like Wilbur is calling Onstad's kid an alien.

name: tellumo
text: Oh, hey, I completely misunderstood that. Oops, my bad.

name: psykeres
text: Philippe's naivete is a lens which reveals how horrible and complex the universe is.

name: rowboat
text: Instead of hating this comment, which was my initial reaction, I've decided that I love it. I'm not sure how that works or why it matters.

name: xi
text: Yes.

name: snoozebar
text: I love how Onstad is the horrible asshole.

name: shmuckeles
text: oh my god thank you achewood for making me laugh again

name: djwhiterabbit
text: THE ONSTAD HAS GOT NO MERCY.

name: andrew_
text: Give Onstad a break. Having a baby is serious times, dogg.

name: riazm
text: Is Onstad wearing Vans?

name: waldo913
text: I suspect Sketchers.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Onstad is a early/mid 30's white male and a former skateboarder (presumably). They're Vans. Trust me, we're suckers for 'em.

I'm not a big fan of buying the retro-looking Vans, though. It's okay to still wear the same brand of shoes from your childhood, but not the same design. That's taking nostalgia a little too far.

name: coridoroiy
text: Ed's Vans

name: woodenteeth
text: sneaky reference. nice.

name: biznart
text: Dare we ask what bought them?

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Connellingus, lux, goodgravy)

name: joeyramoney
text: my goodness!

name: lereya
text: That's a talented five-year-old, what can write in cursive.

name: doc_rostov
text: I think I knew cursive before I could articulate a graph of a sound wave.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
OH SHIT MAN!!!
THOSE FOUR POSTS ARE AMAZING!!
it looks like deancain29 is calling to joeyramoney as Phillipe!
and then roast beef and lie bot turn up!!
man im stoned

name: rowboat
text: Let the smoke clear, then reevaluate.

text: Its all the sweeter because your avatar is a stoned ray

text: his name also complements the stoned theme

name: puguglypress
text: How so?

name: xi
text: Jesus I can't stop crying. You are so right. About everything.

text: best ever

text: Haha Onstad you fucking dick

name: semiquaver
text: Something about the juxtaposition of "Haha" and "fucking dick" makes this incredibly hilarious.

name: aperson
text: Tom Baker helps a lot too.

name: semiquaver
text: Tom Baker always helps.

name: _cheesekayke
text:
I get far too upset when Philippe is unhappy.
The relationship between young children and newborns is always interesting. The kids treat the babies much like an adult would, all paternal/maternal.

name: ananke
text: I second that.

name: deusoma
text:
First time I read this, I thought Onstad was crazy overreacting to the information. Now I see he's just being a dick to Phillipe.

Which is okay, since Phillipe is not a stranger.

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by erributtz, chivalress, unkle_bob, Art-Vader, BillyLK)

name: ferdinand
text: "the father?"

name: dasilodavi
text: The dude with the legs.  I guess it's actually Onstad.

name: molesticide
text:
chris is such a prick-

i LOVE this strip-

those two things are related to each other.

name: c_dizzle
text:
Onstad, why must you be so sadistic to your otters?

I suppose a better question is actually, "why do you leave said otter too look after your infant?"...but the first one seems more relevant, and what WOULDN'T any of us leave Phillipe in charge of? Really.

name: c_dizzle
text:
To many 'o's.

(There, I've canceled my mistake).

name: skyisfalling
text: The Internet remembers. Two years later, it remembers

text: He is five.

text: the little boy in me absolutely LOVES the fart jokes!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Onstad: Chicken Stock, Chicken Stock

name: gmm
text: There's something very funny about anyone being a dick to Phillippe. Even though it is wrong.

name: stewieisgod13
text: Philippe is so silly...

name: ananke
text: I find this hysterical...which makes me cry. Poor Philippe. :*(

name: direhaggis
text: The fourth bell-curve fart has hella kurtosis.

name: radiowires
text: this is actually probably my very favorite strip of all time. my goodness!

name: charchar
text: The true artist portrays himself as he really is; a dude who is sometimes mean to threatened species.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Also cognizant of his own hyper-attentive anxieties concerning said new born and possibly making fun of himself via comic with an exaggerated example..?

Okay, okay, I don't usually jump on the Psychoanalyze-Herr-Onstad train, but sometimes it's fun to think about.

Or, ya know, he's just being a dick.
(I'm.. so sorry everyone..)

name: mrectomy
text: Damn, even Onstad is a dick to Phillipe. You would think that at least the creator would have some sympathy for his creation.

name: sex_bicycle
text: AHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA! That is all

name: carlyle
text: Onstad isn't being a dick, he's worried! He's a very loving father and wants to know wether or not the baby farted the second time!

name: greenkoolayd
text: phillipe is going to have Circumstances if he grows up.

name: milo
text: has anyone noticed how genius the phrase "seven-series gas panel" is?
